title: Recording Replays = Bugsplat
body:
I wanted to record a replay with some plays I've never made before along with some funny stuff. I managed to record stuff about 2/3 into the game but passed that, the replay will keep playing, but if I try to record anything it bugsplats consistently at the same time. I've never had issues with recording replays before and I'll admit I don't use it often, but I'm wondering if the bugsplat is something with the most recent patch or if there's something you can do to fix it.

Thanks.

replies.body: This could be due to some corrupt game files that's failing to render the game while attempting to use the replay too.  There's also always the chance of an outdated driver as well.  In this case, run through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this for the fix.  I hope that helps!
